articles.title: Summer saris to steal from Janhvi Kapoor
articles.description: Looking for some sari inspiration in summer?  We have actor Janhvi Kapoor, who surely have the best collection of saris that you can bookmark for your summer outings. Take a look.
articles.content: Nothing can beat the elegance of a white chiffon sari. Take cues from Jahnvi, who styles it with a sleeveless blouse and her hair open in cascading waves.

articles.title: Tsitsipas sees off Sinner to reach Rome semis after match point drama
articles.description: Stefanos Tsitsipas reached the semi-finals of the Italian Open on Friday after beating local hero Jannick Sinner 7-6 (7/5) 6-2 in a match which was stopped for over 10 minutes at match point after a spectator fell ill.
